comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Casas Grandes, a town in northern Chihuahua state southwest of Columbus, New Mexico, was General Pershing's main base when he began his pursuit of Pancho Villa in March, 1916. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pancho_Villa_Expedition select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10614F73B5B1773...
